QuestData.Title: Faces of Evil
QuestData.Description: The Vilebranch have hung their tiki masks all across the walls of Jintha'Alor. The spirits not gonna be watchin' over them much longer.$B$BTake this torch with ya as ya fight through the Vilebranch, $c. Set fire to their tiki masks. I'll be watchin' from here as their wards and hexes fade away, an' their heretical dark voodoo goes up in smoke.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Tiki Torch to set fire to 8 Tiki Masks at Jintha'Alor.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't see enough lights burnin', $c. Better get goin'.
QuestData.RewardText: Such a pretty site ta see the enemy's hopes burnin'...
